text: "Shiftwork" is a song written by Troy Jones and recorded by American country music artist Kenny Chesney with George Strait as a duet. It was released in December 10, 2007 as the third single from Chesney's 2007 album Just Who I Am: Poets & Pirates. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Shaun Silva and was premiered on CMT on December 6, 2007. It shows various people lip- syncing to the song. The video debuted at number 13 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of January 3, 2008. The music video reached number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for the week of February 28, 2008. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Kenny Chesney songs Category:BNA Records singles Category:Music videos directed by Shaun Silva
title: Shiftwork
